content:
I was working on this issue #20935 to hide the unread counts and replace them with the three-dot menu on hover. However, the issue was written a year ago, and a lot has changed since then. With the new direct messages section, the proposed issue does not seem to be right with the current UI. I tried to solve the issue, but I think the issue description needs to be changed. I think instead of replacing the location of the three dots with unread counts, maybe the unread counts should be placed in the location of the three dots to maintain consistency.

Screenshot-from-2023-04-02-22-41-13.png

I think it's possible we should close this issue as wontfix, as current thinking is that we'd use that the the column that currently has the \vdots menu for a pinned icon for pinner streams/topics when not hovered. But I'll leave it as-is for Alya Abbott to review.
Yeah, let's close this out. I think it's been superseded by #design > UI redesign: left sidebar .
